text: Edvin "Edi" Rama (born 4 July 1964) is an Albanian politician, artist and writer. He is also the Prime Minister of Albania since 2013, and the leader of the Socialist Party of Albania since 2005. He was the Minister of Culture, Youth, and Sports from 1998 to 2000 and Mayor of Tirana from 2000 to 2011. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Mayors Category:Prime ministers of Albania Category:Socialist politicians Category:Albanian writers
title: Edi Rama
